notifications.title: 🛠 Sneak Peek: Samhiq Mailer v2.6 is Coming
notifications.message: Get ready for v2.6 — bringing 🔐 Advanced SMTP Testing, 📁 Drag & Drop File Attachments, 📤 Auto-Save Drafts, 🎯 Advanced Targeting Filters, and 🧩 Plugin Support for custom extensions. A smarter, more powerful mailer experience is on the way!
